description: Claude Lazy Genius - Team Hooks (Multiple Developers)

hooks.command: mkdir -p .claude-team/daily && echo "Session: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')\nDeveloper: $(git config user.name || echo 'unknown')\nBranch: $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'main')" > .claude/session.md

PostToolUse.description: Track file changes with developer attribution

hooks.command: DEV=$(git config user.name | tr ' ' '-' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' || echo 'unknown'); FILE=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | grep -o '"file_path":[^,}]*' | cut -d'"' -f4 || echo 'unknown'); echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) [$DEV] Edit: $FILE" >> ".claude-team/daily/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)-$DEV.md"

DEV=$(git config user.name | tr ' ' '-' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' || echo 'unknown'); CMD=$(echo $CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT | grep -o '"command":[^,}]*' | cut -d'"' -f4 | head -c 50); echo "$(date +%H:%M:%S) [$DEV] Cmd: $CMD..." >> ".claude-team/daily/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)-$DEV.md"

DEV=$(git config user.name | tr ' ' '-' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' || echo 'unknown'); echo "
## Session End: $(date +%H:%M:%S)
---
" >> ".claude-team/daily/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)-$DEV.md"
